description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Udemy Marketing - Udemy Course Marketing Advanced Training

So You Want To Know How To Market Your Udemy Course?

But don't know where to start with your Udemy Marketing?

If you understand how to get Google+ and YouTube work for you, then you will gain a massive advantage in your marketing.

Great course packed with actionable content Another superb marketing course from Mark Timberlake. This gave me not only the information I needed to create a marketing strategy for my courses, but also a clear, actionable blueprint on how to do it. ~ Frauke Nonnenmacher

By creating a good Social Media Content Marketing Strategy, your course could really start taking off in the Udemy marketplace.

Driving your own traffic to your Udemy Course and creating your own marketing funnel means that you can earn up to 97% of all the commission from your course.

It also helps you because as you increase traffic to your course, both Google and Udemy will start to reward you with better rankings on their respective sites.

Content Marketing Strategy

That sounds sort of complicated, doesn't it?

But it isn't, it is really very simple.

We will show you how to create a marketing strategy that creates a sales funnel that brings people back to your course.

Social Media Automation

You will learn some very simple methods for automating your social media activity so that you can cut down the time you need to spend posting to different platforms.

Why Use Google+ and YouTube?

Google+ and YouTube are owned by Google and are joined at the hip.

They get treated in a very special way in Google search and in this course we will teach you how to take advantage of that unique relationship.

We will also show you how to deeply impact Google search by creating Google+ connections.

Google+ Demystified

By the time you have completed this course, Google+ will no longer be a land of strange happenings, but a land of opportunity for helping you develop your online Udemy residual income streams.

You will understand how to use all the key features and we will not bog you down with over complicated stuff you don't need to know.

We will teach you the core concepts and then you will find it easy to really get Google+ working for you.

Grow Your Google+ Following Quickly

We will teach you how to grow your followers quickly and how to target niche groups on Google+

Google+ Communities

We will also show you how to create a Google+ community so that you can promote your expertise.

You will learn how to do this very simply and easily.

Hangouts On Air

We will also show you how to use Hangouts On Air, which is an incredible engagement tool and extremely powerful for helping you establish your expertise and help you get found in Google search.

YouTube - A Udemy Instructors Best Friend

When people are searching for information or education, they typically use YouTube.

We will explain why you should create video content that leads back to your Udemy course and show you how it can drive traffic.

So Join Us On The Other Side

And learn how to take control of your Udemy Course Marketing by getting a head start on the competition and learning how to use Google+ and YouTube to create an incredibly powerful marketing strategy.
title: Udemy Marketing - Advanced Udemy Marketing - Unofficial
